duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare federal, state, and local tax documents
Recommend tax strategies by researching federal, state, and local taxation issues
Maintain compliance with regulations by forwarding required information to federal, state, and local authorities
Update job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting (Master’s Degree in Taxation preferred)
Current CPA license is preferred but not required
